channel.title: Lead Team Graduate Student Instructor | Named After Numeral

item.title: STATS 250 @ University of Michigan
item.description:
Stats 250 is a one-term, algebra-based introductory statistics course that introduces students to the investigative process of statistics so they may become critical consumers of statistics. Students will learn to summarize data both graphically and numerically and to use their understanding of variability to make inference from a sample to the population.

Introduction to Statistics and Data Analysis

Also taught in Fall 2021, Spring 2022.
